name: Premium Basmati Rice (5 kg)
description: Aged long-grain Basmati rice from the foothills of Himalayas. Perfect for biryani and pulao.

name: Darjeeling First Flush Tea (250g)
description: Hand-picked first flush Darjeeling tea with a delicate muscatel flavour. A true connoisseur's delight.

name: Kanjivaram Silk Saree
description: Authentic Kanjivaram pure silk saree with traditional zari border. A timeless heirloom piece.

name: Himalaya Neem Face Wash (150ml)
description: Ayurvedic neem and turmeric face wash that removes impurities and keeps skin fresh all day.

name: Brass Deepak Diya Set (Set of 6)
description: Handcrafted pure brass diyas, ideal for puja, Diwali decoration, and gifting. Tarnish-resistant.

name: Organic Kashmiri Saffron (2g)
description: Pure A++ grade Kashmiri Mogra saffron with rich colour, aroma, and taste. Lab tested for purity.

name: Khadi Herbal Hand Block Print Kurta
description: Hand block-printed pure cotton Khadi kurta, naturally dyed. Breathable fabric perfect for Indian summers.

name: Jodhpuri Steel Masala Dabba
description: Traditional 7-compartment stainless steel spice box with a tight-seal lid. Rust-free and food-grade.

name: Rajasthani Camel Leather Mojari
description: Handmade genuine camel leather mojari with intricate embroidery work by Rajasthani artisans.

name: Cold Pressed Coconut Oil (1 Litre)
description: Wood-pressed extra virgin coconut oil from Kerala's finest coconut groves. No preservatives, no chemicals.

name: Sandalwood Incense Sticks (Pack of 100)
description: Pure Mysore sandalwood agarbatti with long-lasting fragrance. Ideal for meditation, yoga, and puja.

name: Madhubani Art Canvas Painting
description: Original hand-painted Madhubani art from Bihar. Each piece is unique, signed by the artist. Ready to frame.
